items.question: How can I purchase tickets?
items.answer: Tickets can be purchased online. Visit www.tanweerfestival.com* for more information.

items.question: What is included in the ticket price?
Are there any discounts available for tickets?
items.answer: Guests who purchase early-bird tickets can secure discounted rates. Visit https://tickets.tanweerfestival.com/* for more information.

items.question: Can I get a refund if I can't attend the festival?
items.answer: No, all ticket sales are non-refundable.

items.question: Can I transfer my ticket to someone else?
Do I need to bring a printed ticket to the festival?
items.answer: You can, but you may also show your ticket on your mobile device at the festival entrance. Save paper!

items.question: What happens if it rains during the festival?
items.answer: Provided it is safe to do so, the festival will go on, come rain or shine. Please bring appropriate clothing and footwear for inclement weather, according to the forecast.
